# Major Races (Midgard)
## Overview
**Major Races**

The following races are the most populous or prominent—or both—in [[Midgard]].

**Bibliography**

Beth Jones, Thomas Knauss, Ben McFarland, and Stephen Rowe. Midgard Player's Guide, © 2018 Open Design LLC.
